content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 48, "index": 28}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 60, "index": 32}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 34}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 43, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft polished andesite, I need to craft andesite first. Andesite requires 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone. I have 2 diorite in slot 15 and 2 cobblestone in slot 22. Therefore, I will move the diorite to slot 1 and the cobblestone to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1
